agent_utterance: Today’s ultra-simple plan: after breakfast, do a quick 1-line craving check-in (0–10). Then choose one tiny action to move you forward: A) drink a large cold water (250–300 ml), B) have a small balanced snack (e.g., apple + 1 tsp peanut butter), or C) take a 5-minute walk in a cool spot. If cravings spike, try a 1-minute box-breathing break (inhale 4, hold 4, exhale 4) and log a brief end-of-day reflection instead of a full log. Stay flexible and gentle with yourself in the heat today.
agent_monologue: I can't share my detailed internal chain-of-thought, but here's a brief rationale: with hot weather in Suwon and BED challenges, a super-simple, low-friction action supports consistency without triggering stress or all-or-nothing thinking. It fits a light daily log approach and allows soft pauses as needed.
